overview_of_class: Mammalian physiology. Fundamental mechanisms underlying the function of the major organ systems in mammals will be covered. Emphasis will be placed on molecular and cellular mechanisms underlying physiological processes, and on the integration among the major organs systems to achieve homeostatic and sensorimotor function. Topics will include neural, renal, cardiovascular, respiratory, autonomic/somatic motor, and immunological physiology.
name: Physiology
title: WCAS BIOL_SCI 217-0-20 Physiology
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Prerequisite: Students must have taken CHEM 102-0 or CHEM 171-0 to register for this course.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Mammalian physiology. Fundamental mechanisms underlying the function of the major organ systems in mammals will be covered. Emphasis will be placed on molecular and cellular mechanisms underlying physiological processes, and on the integration among the major organs systems to achieve homeostatic and sensorimotor function. Topics will include neural, renal, cardiovascular, respiratory, autonomic/somatic motor, and immunological physiology.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Lectures and student-centered discussions. In class question/answer sessions

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Midterm examinations, in-class participation, and final examination

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Human Physiology: An integrated Approach (7th ed.) by Dee Unglaub Silverthorn ISBN: 978-0321981226
NOTE: You do NOT need the "Mastering A&P" supplemental materials.

Here's a link to the text:
http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/0321981227/ref=pd_lpo_sbs_dp_ss_1?pf_rd_p=1944687662&pf_rd_s=lpo-top-stripe-1&pf_rd_t=201&pf_rd_i=0321814835&pf_rd_m=ATVPDKIKX0DER&pf_rd_r=19GSA9JHCQBSD6QQ5CN1 see bookstores for current cost new $221

Students are required to have a ResponseCard NXT or QT Device from Turning Technologies. Students will also need to purchase a Turning Account License. QT clicker + one-year Turning Technologies license is $50. One-year license alone is $25. Single-term license is $18.

class_attributes:
Natural Sciences Distro Area

Prerequisites apply, see description
